duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item-specific training.
Managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring and performing post-project work and data analysis.
Thorough knowledge of science topics for Elementary, Middle, and High School Science and an ability to apply state and national science standards.
Clear communication to a variety of roles daily, both in person and virtually, and the ability to work in a team environment.
Mentoring and training Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in the expectations of each of those roles and how to perform those duties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Additional Math college courses preferred)
Two (2) years assessment industry experience as a Scoring Director or other scoring team lead or equivalent experience
